text: “It’s Halloween!
And the ghosts and ghouls are coming back!”

All round you
You see them come

Your face pales
You feel dread

Your heart thumps
Through the deep fog

They’re in your sight
You see ghouls

You hear growls
You feel fright

Up and down and right beside you
Near and far and even behind you

Big and frightening what do you do
Magic spells or dolls of voodoo

You can’t run it’s Halloween Night
You can’t run it’s Halloween Night
Try to run down straight to your home
You don’t want to be here
All alone when you try to
Ring up your friends you hear them
And their growls on your phone

Up and down and right beside you
Near and far and even behind you

Big and frightening what do you do
Magic spells or dolls of voodoo

You can’t run it’s Halloween Night
You can’t run it’s Halloween Night

All round you 
You see them come

Your face pales
You feel dread

Your heart thumps
Through the deep fog

They’re in your sight
You see ghouls

You hear growls
You feel fright

Up and down and right beside you
Near and far and even behind you

Big and frightening what do you do
Magic spells or dolls of voodoo

You can’t run it’s Halloween Night
You can’t run it’s Halloween Night
You can’t run it’s Halloween Night
